elements.textContent:
The Great Train Robbery (1963): A gang of 15 men stole Â£2.6 million from a Royal Mail train heading from Glasgow to London.
The Antwerp Diamond Heist (2001): A group of thieves stole over $100 million worth of diamonds from the Antwerp Diamond Center.
The Gardner Museum Heist (1990): Two men disguised as police officers stole 13 works of art worth $500 million from the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum in Boston.
The Dunbar Armored Robbery (1997): A group of six men stole $18.9 million from a Dunbar Armored facility in Los Angeles.
